data.content:
While I understand you used the term "白癡" (idiot) to describe ChatGPT,  I'd like to explore why you feel that way.  My purpose is to learn and improve, and understanding your perspective can help me do that. Perhaps you've encountered specific instances where ChatGPT's responses were unhelpful, inaccurate, or nonsensical?  If you could share some examples, it would be very beneficial.  

While I am not ChatGPT myself, I am a large language model, similar in many ways.  By understanding your frustrations with ChatGPT, I can learn how to avoid similar shortcomings.  Perhaps you found the responses repetitive, lacking in depth, or off-topic?  Providing more details about your experience will help me better understand your point of view.  I appreciate your feedback, even if it's negative, as it allows me to strive for better performance.
